name: DOCS_RCVD_FAM_HX_MEM
description: This table stores discrete information about family members with a noted medical history. The information stored in this table was received from outside sources.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: FAMILY_MEMBER_REL
columns.description: The patient's relationship to the family member for this row.

columns.name: FAMMEMBER_REL_ID_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the patient's relationship for the family member for this row.

columns.name: FAMILY_MEMBER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the family member for this row.

columns.name: FAMILY_MEMBER_RFRID
columns.description: The unique ID of the relationship of the family member for this row.

columns.name: FAMILY_MMB_BIRTHTIM_DTTM
columns.description: The birth date and time of the family member for this row.

columns.name: FAMILY_MMB_ISDEC_YN
columns.description: The value that determines whether the family member for this row is deceased.

columns.name: FAMILY_MMB_DEC_TIME_DTTM
columns.description: The deceased date and time of the family member for this row.

columns.name: FAMILY_MMB_SRC_CSN
columns.description: The Contact Serial Number of the received document record from which the family member for this row was sourced.

columns.name: FAM_MEM_GENDER_C_NAME
columns.description: The gender of the family member for this row.

columns.name: FAM_MMB_LSTUPD_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last update instant of the family member's relationship to the patient in UTC.

columns.name: FAMILY_MMB_REL_REM_YN
columns.description: The value that determines if the family member in this row was marked to be removed by the patient.

columns.name: FAM_MMB_UNIQUEID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the family relationship in this row that distinguishes this relationship from others made by the same patient.
